openAPIV3Schema.description: Namespace is the Schema for the namespaces API

apiVersion.description:
APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.
Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and
may reject unrecognized values.

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to.

In CamelCase.

spec.description:
A Namespace is a logical partition within the cluster that provides a mechanism for isolating resources.
Namespaces allow for resource segmentation, enabling multiple teams or applications to share the same cluster without conflict.

description.description: An optional description of the use of the namespace.

status.description: NamespaceStatus defines the observed state of Namespace
